entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Corrupting exceptions are not turned into fail fasts #103018
    9.0.0
  • .NET connectivity issue, outbound connection timeout #103017
  • TypeLoadException when using a struct with an ImmutableArray containing the struct itself #103014
  • [API Proposal]: Expose the `NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported` property #103004
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Reconsider block weight propagation in loop cloning #103001
    9.0.0
  • Environment variable DOTNET_DbgEnableMiniDump=1 doens't work when unhandled exception occurs in worker thread #103000
    9.0.0
  • ILVerify falsely reports a field being modified #102997
  • [Mono/x64] MutualThdRecur-fptr test crash #102995
  • [WASM] browser-wasm tests fail with "Cannot box IsByRefLike type" #102988
    9.0.0
  • IAsyncEnumerableOfTConverter<TAsyncEnumerable, TElement> throws OutOfMemoryException when custom JsonConverter involved #102984
  • [API Proposal]: TensorPrimitives.HammingDistance #102980
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.Tests.PEBuilderTests.NativeResources #102979
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_55107/Runtime_55107/Runtime_55107.cmd #102978
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_55107/Runtime_55107/Runtime_55107.cmd #102976
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.Int16GenericTensorPrimitives.SumOfMagnitudes_MinValue_Throws #102975
    9.0.0

Closed

  • ComInterfaceGenerator Method/Interface Info/Context types should limit construction and modification #101615
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 application crashes on startup with error code 0x80008093 #102898
  • ILLink: Preserve implementation for default static interface methods #102008
    9.0.0
  • Windows file details missing from win-x64 exe built on Linux #2101
    Future
  • Update GeneratedRegex to support partial properties #77797
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 8] Some Symbol Entries in perf-%pid.map Are Truncated #102938
  • Activity should have AddExceptionMethod #53641
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Running any Thread for longer than 5000 ms crashes runtime (Blazor) #86903
  • Enable Edit and Continue support for Mac #2349
    Future
  • .Net 6.0 Environment.CommandLine and Environment.GetCommandLineArgs() unable to get the correct command line parameters #102968
  • Config Section Binding to Records that contains a Collection with Primary Constructors results in Duplicated Collection #102999
  • Different JavaScript Objects are wrapped by the same JSObject instance. #96512
  • Request with HttpVersion > 3 and RequestVersionOrHigher policy sent as H/3 request #72185
    Future
  • Applications missing DLL Files after automatic update #102804
  • [wasi] Tracking issue for test failures #82561
    9.0.0
  • Documentation error for System.IO.Directory.GetFiles(string path, string searchPattern, EnumerationOptions enumerationOptions) #95730
    Future
  • .net 9 Preview 4 NetworkInterface.GetIPProperties().GatewayAddresses is broken and always empty #102983
  • [QUIC] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteCanceled_NextWriteThrows Expected exception not thrown #98078
    9.0.0
  • Implement string resources for coreclr on OSX #4127

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-write Android PBKDF2 one shot in Java #103016
    area-System.Security
  • Improve Json flushing #103015
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Remove `Thread::TSNC_IgnoreUnhandledExceptions` #103013
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530 #103012
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add Base64Fuzzer to the repo #103011
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert `RuntimeHelpers.IsReferenceOrContainsReferences` to JIT intrinsic #103010
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Change tags parameter in Activity.AddException to be `in` parameter. #103009
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Avoid a few allocations in StringContent #103008
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Enable CET shadow stack compatibility in `apphost`/`singlefilehost` by default #103007
    area-HostModel
  • [release/8.0-staging] Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #103006
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Tensor validations, scope changes, and TensorPrimitives methods #103005
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [CI test] Enable JitOptRepeat unconditionally #103002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable parallel test execution for QUIC and HTTP/3 and enable some disabled http3 tests #102996
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ARM64-SVE: Saturating*ByActiveElementCount #102994
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Compact API #102992
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix double Content-Length header in HttpWebRequest #102989
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders" #102986
  • Work around issue #102868 #102982
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Propagate the exception from last retry #102974
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Delete test testing a weird delegate implementation detail #102647
    needs-area-label
  • Add support for Sve.ReverseElementX() #102991
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Enable GeneratedRegex on partial properties #102977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a bug in PAL version of _vsnprint_f #103003
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Adding Activity.AddException #102905
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • Revert uses of Unsafe.BitCast with spans to unblock mono #102998
    needs-area-label
  • Baseline failing reflection and Regressions tests #102812
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Propagate profile flags to loop preheaders in `Compiler::optCloneLoops` #102897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update prerequisites to add azure.identity #102274
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • fix crossgen2determinism test #102742
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize HttpUtility.UrlEncodeToBytes for (string, Encoding) overload. #102805
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Consistent ConfigureAwait on Loopback, RemoteExecutor.DisposeAsync #102699
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 9.0.0
  • Upgrade GCLogParser to NetCoreAppToolCurrent #101089
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in SseParser #102993
    area-System.Net
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add gcinfodumper implementation. #102920
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Baseline failing pri-1 interop tests #102916
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't needlessly track the method handle for hwintrinsics when optimizations are disabled #102973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 4 #102921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2465940 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Change Vector2/3/4, Quaternion, Plane, Vector<T>, and Vector64/128/256/512<T> to be implemented in managed where trivially possible #102301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [test] Update the reason why Verify_Generic_ConstraintEnforcement is not running on Mono #102939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use IsOSPlatform instead of checking for /proc #101547
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Switch to AllowByRefLike naming in Mono as well #102516
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host
  • Remove cached cgroup values #102971
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host
  • JIT: Move targets of hot jumps to create fallthrough post-RPO layout #102927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #102095
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.x
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Better createdump error message for single-file apps for heap or triage dump types. #102959
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update Android and Linux-Bionic images #102928
    os-android, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    no-recent-activity, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Reduce allocation in HttpUtility.UrlPathEncode. #102909
    community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #92901 #102862
    area-Infrastructure
  • ILCompiler.pkgproj: remove 'runtime.json' when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #102908
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize HttpUtility.JavaScriptStringEncode by using SearchValues #102917
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Test CI #102967
    NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-preview5] [wasm] Stop setting problematic runtime feature switches #102943
    Servicing-consider, area-Workloads
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ILLink: Add EventDefinitionNode to dependency analysis #102578
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fill in FeatureCheckDataflow.cs assertions with issue links #102679
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Migrating EsrpCodeSigning Task From Version 4 to Version 5 #102948
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix build on alpine arm64 #102953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][wasi] Allow to build wasi in library mode #102806
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Fix alloc-dealloc mismatch in GC #102929
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move Disposal of QuicStream to the Http3Connection Prototype #102597
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Remove runtimeconfig.template.json from templates and provide it by default #102818
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove noisy test #102610
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Fix context restoration as #101709 describes #101865
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multi-Targeting Roslyn analyzers with support for pre-SDK format projects #41352

Closed

  • Allow 'add project reference' post action for existing projects #40132
  • Failed to create a 6.0 project with error "error NU1102: Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 6.0.32)" After installing the June service .net 8.0 sdk #41297
  • Container tests started failing with the runtime insertion #41272
  • The latest .NET 9.0 SDK form designer cannot load #41250

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Update branch filters for SB SDK Diff Pipeline #41363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2465731 #41254
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branch filters for SB SDK Diff Pipeline #41350
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix Target Branch for PR Updator #41360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow 'Add project reference' for existing projects #40133
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix Target Branch for PR Updator #41354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #41341
  • Fix license scan test results path for trx files #41340
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add SdkTarballPath prop #41339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Removes problematic system.text.json switches #41322
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add implementation of Aspire service #41319
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Import StaticWebAssets SDK only for browser-wasm #41306
    Area-WasmSdk
  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio Inserting Duplicate "Option Strict On" in VB.NET Class files #73827
  • Enable argument wrapping code fix for collection expressions #73826
    Backlog

Closed

  • Internal compiler crash when compiler diagnostic CS0103 is expected #73813
  • Incorrect receiver capture with `ref C` receiver and interpolation handler #73667
    17.11
  • Allow multiple break/continue keywords in a row #73824
  • macOS tests are crashing regularly #70233

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround issue with invalid diagnostics reported via TS workspace diagnostics #73833
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Global options2 #73832
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • WIP: test. #73828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73825
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Merged

  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73831
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize helper we use to determine the relevant node of a particular kind the user is on. #73812
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always use a by-value temp to capture a reference type receiver #73631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix build host when only the .net 6 SDK is installed #73818
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Build interval tree from sorted nodes #73819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce Linq usage in SymbolDisplayVisitor.CreateAliasMap #73793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix exponential blowup parsing pathological files #73788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate ISymbol implementations at runtime to avoid type load errors #73675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose 5 more things to Razor cohosting #73781
  • Rename SG run mode from Balanced to Manual #73784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add query string to dotnet.js to fix Blazor displaying blank page after framework upgrade #56054
  • Unintended localization for DateTime strings #56053
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #56051
  • .NET 8 Hybrid App (WPF + Vue.js + AspNetCore) no longer creates wwwroot during publish after upgrading SDK version of esproj file #56050
  • Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.AzureAppServices #56049
  • [NativeAOT] Incorrect source generator types when Minimal API endpoint delegate return type is inferred #56048
  • Reconsider the Platform concept in the new render mode detection API #56047
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication make possible to configure options in AuthenticationBuilder by dependencies from IServiceProvider #56044
  • HybridCache can create multiple times the same key on Redis #56043
  • Blazor Should able to add Server/Static component to Child of Client component #56042
  • Add endpoint metadata to disable HTTP metrics #56039
    9.0.0
  • [SignalR - Java Client] Add support for Automatic Reconnection #56033
  • SignalR message delivery to Clients.All stops working and doesn't resume without Application Restart #56032
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, json #56030
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.5.24281.15] Fail to build the app after retargeted to .NET 9.0 with error “System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added.” #56029
    9.0-preview7
  • Health checks should help facilitate OTEL tracing #56028

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi generate scheme doc Error when minimalapi endpoint return `ValidationProblem` #55883
    9.0-preview6
  • Exception during HTTP request using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect.OpenIdConnectHandler #55881
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56031
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #56024
  • Config Section Binding to Records that contains a Collection with Primary Constructors results in Duplicated Collection #56046
  • .NET8 QuickGrid Pagination not working #56041
  • Adding WebAssembly to Blazor Web App template fails: dotnet.js not found #56013
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56026
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef #56011
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext, plaintext #56016
  • Incorrect Serialization of long (Int64) Values in ASP.NET Core Web API #55571
  • miniwebapi Failed to read parameter "Parameters para" from the request body as JSON #55848
  • Binding is not working in VS2022 #55869

PullRequests

Created

  • bump #56052
    area-dataprotection, area-infrastructure, area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, area-signalr, area-identity, area-blazor, area-grpc, area-hosting, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24302.3 #56034
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Add test coverage for generic types #55940
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview6
  • Bump update-dotnet-sdk action #56010
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Add analyzer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Fixes #55987 , input date does not work properly on interactive serve… #55990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Experimental revert of P/Invoke layer #55519
    feature-httpsys, area-networking
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Understanding metrics and memory usage of a .net app (seem mostly consume by cache and fragmentation) #4697
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Project template improvements #22813
  • Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -6 (SI_TKILL) in tid 25847 (.NET TP Worker) - Bridge SCC at index must NOT be alive #22812
  • Bridge SCC at index must NOT be alive #22811
  • Sometimes .ttf files are missing in the application after the apk or aab build #22806
  • Add a platform specific for ripple color #22805
  • TemplateView applies Background to root view #22802
  • [Testing] Fix CI related issues with Window based tests on catalyst #22799
    Backlog
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers package, add to Controls #22798
    .NET 8 SR7
  • CS0117: 'Resource' does not contain a definition for #22796
  • WinRt exception when page navigated #22790
  • Add DateTimeOffset overload to Preferences #22786

Closed

  • TemplateBinding with CornerRadius on Border does not work anymore #21747
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [macOS] Crash in multi-window mode in the Controls.sample project #21306
    .NET 8 SR6
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: ObjectDisposed_Generic ObjectDisposed_ObjectName_Name, Android.OS.PowerManager #22204
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Improving Navigation Speed and Performance #14591
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger #22036
    Backlog
  • iOS App crashes when populating CollectionView #22754
  • (iOS) - Memory Leak in CollectionView with GroupItemTemplate on iOS in MAUI #22752

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios/catalyst] fix leak in NavigationPage #22810
    memory-leak 💦
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨
  • [XC] Respects GenerateFullPaths #22808
  • Fixing _loaded event firing logic #22807
    community ✨
  • [workload] fix missing files during the build #22804
  • [XC] Produce warning when x:DataType is inherited from outer scope of `DataTemplate` #22803
    area-xaml
  • Increase MAUI library supported version to 13.0 #22794
  • Make sure the package source mapping is correct #22788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix RadioButton selection in Group #22787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-radiobutton

Merged

  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in RadioButton #22800
  • Support changing Window coordinates while changing those coordinates #22583
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger - fix #22503
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Remove .NET 7 from bug template #22759
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Make sure ImageButton always has a background #22717
    area-controls-button
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22712
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Navigation layout improvement #22785
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [Windows] Optimize getting default font size and font family values #22782
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Entry fields do not work correctly if bound to a numeric property from a ViewModel - fix #22777
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Windows] Subscribe less pointer events in `UpdatingGestureRecognizers` #22781
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query/Json: additional small fixes for JSON escaping #33886
    9.0.0
  • Fix case-insensitive logic for column names in SQL queries #33885
    Backlog
  • Is it possible to manually track new entity objects in a query expression? #33884
  • I keep getting: The foreign key property 'Vehicle.CustomerId1' was created in shadow state because a conflicting property with the simple name 'CustomerId' exists in the entity type #33883
  • Cosmos: Non-generic Find/FindAsync on DbContext is not translated to ReadItem #33881
    9.0.0
  • Query/Test: consider splitting GearsOfWar test suite, so that only tests with actual inheritance run in TPT and TPC modes #33878

Closed

  • Invalid optimization of `CASE op WHEN` expressions #33867
    9.0.0
  • JSON path is not properly formatted. #33443
    9.0.0
  • 'Contains' on Value Types / Different Behavior of Like and ILike #33827
  • Query: incorrect results for complex predicate with bitwise AND operation with bool args #30245
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [SMALL] Fix to #33886 - Query/Json: additional small fixes for JSON escaping #33888
  • Generate KeyValueFactory and related instances in the compiled model. #33887

Merged

  • Fix optimization of `CASE op WHEN` #33869
  • Fix to #33443 - JSON path is not properly formatted #33771
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.2.0 to 5.2.1 #33882
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix and enable `Bitwise_and_on_expression_with_like_and_null_check_being_compared_to_false` #33872
  • Translate logical Boolean operators as conditional Boolean operators #33873

Updated

  • Translate ToString() over enums #33706
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
  • Various stuff from EFCore.PG JSON work #32255
  • Fix SQL Server translation of `IndexOf` #33876
  • Fix for #33702 Translation for the SQL Server PATINDEX function #33868
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
  • Fix `unhex()` nullability #33870
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633
  • Precompiled query inner loop source generator #33350
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have Type/type mapping #33053
  • Use provider discriminator values for OfType() #32878
